attributes.action: prohibit the use by British Police Forces of the method known as "pain compliance" when making an arrest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A method used by police officers involves applying pressure to the arteries behind the person's ears. Use of this method when making an arrest, particularly when that person presents no threat to the public, police officers or themselves is excessive, and may well contravene Articles 2 & 3 of the 1998 Human Rights Act.
